summary: This is an email chain from August 2020 forwarding a victim contact list for outreach related to the Epstein case. It involves FBI Victim Services Division personnel coordinating the distribution of the list.

persons.name: MaS
persons.context: Appears as the recipient of the forwarded email containing the victim contact list, based at the FBI New York Office.

events.title: Coordination of Victim Contact List
events.description: An email was sent regarding finalizing and sending over a victim contact list for outreach.

events.title: Forwarding of Victim List
events.description: An email chain is forwarded containing a victim contact list titled 'Epstein Victim Only' to FBI Victim Specialist MaS.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain from August 2020 forwarding a victim contact list for the Epstein case.
The attached file is named 'contact_list_only_31E-NY-3027571_6.26.2020.xlsx', indicating it is a list related to case 31E-NY-3027571 and was created on June 26, 2020.
The correspondence involves FBI Victim Services Division personnel, specifically a Victim Specialist in New York and a Program Manager/Outreach Strategist in the Case Support Unit.
The subject and content indicate ongoing, organized victim outreach efforts by the FBI years after Epstein's death.
The document reference EFTA00153828 is mentioned, suggesting it is part of a series of related documents.
